articles.description: Thirteen goals, countless comebacks and a whole mountain of chaos - Inter's win over Barcelona will go down as a Champions League classic.
articles.title: Inter MIlan and Barcelona serve up Champions League classic nobody wanted to end

articles.description: Inter Miami relinquish their option to hold talks with Kevin de Bruyne when he leaves Manchester City this summer - leaving Chicago Fire in pole position to bring him to the MLS.
articles.title: Kevin de Bruyne: Inter Miami relinquish MLS discovery rights on Manchester City midfielder

articles.description: Inter Milan's stunning 7-6 aggregate win against Barcelona was one of the all-time great Champions League semi-finals, but where does it rank?
articles.title: Champions League semi-finals: Where does Inter Milan v Barcelona rank among classics?

articles.description: Gujarat Titans beat Mumbai Indians - and the rain - to snatch a remarkable final-ball victory and go top of the Indian Premier League.
articles.title: IPL 2025: Gujarat Titans beat Mumbai Indians - and rain - in extraordinary finish

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Inter Milan vs Barcelona in the UEFA Champions League
articles.title: LIVE Champions League: Inter Milan vs Barcelona: UEFA Champions League stats & head-to-head

articles.description: Cristiano's Ronaldo's eldest son is called up to the Portugal Under-15 squad for the first time.
articles.title: Cristiano Ronaldo: Portugal Under-15s call-up for son of Real Madrid and Man Utd legend

articles.description: Following the deaths of two riders at the British Supersport Championship at Oulton Park on Monday, BBC Sport looks at what is next for the sport.
articles.title: British Supersport Championship: What happened at Oulton Park and what next for the sport?

articles.description: Declan Rice says Arsenal need "big balls" and "magic moments" if they are to overturn their semi-final deficit against Paris St-Germain and reach the Champions League final.
articles.title: PSG v Arsenal: Gunners need 'big balls and magic moments' to reach Champions League final, says Declan Rice

articles.description: Real Madrid are aiming to complete the signing of Trent Alexander-Arnold from Liverpool before the start of the Club World Cup.
articles.title: Real Madrid seek to sign Trent Alexander-Arnold for Club World Cup

articles.description: Will Paris St-Germain goalkeeper Gianluigi Donnarumma thwart Arsenal again on Wednesday, and why are the French side considering selling him?
